name: streakbank-smart-contracts

scripts.deploy:verify:ropsten: truffle compile --all && npm run ipfs && truffle deploy -f 2 --network ropsten --reset
scripts.deploy:verify:kovan: truffle compile --all && npm run ipfs && truffle deploy -f 2 --network kovan --reset
scripts.deploy:verify:mainnet: truffle compile --all && npm run ipfs && truffle deploy -f 2 --network mainnet --reset
scripts.deploy:verify:polygon: truffle compile --all && npm run ipfs && truffle deploy -f 2 --network polygon --reset
scripts.deploy:verify:polygon-whitelisted: truffle compile --all && npm run ipfs && truffle deploy -f 2 --network polygon-whitelisted --reset
scripts.deploy:verify:alfajores: truffle compile --all && npm run ipfs && truffle deploy -f 2 --network alfajores --reset
scripts.deploy:verify:celo: truffle compile --all && npm run ipfs && truffle deploy -f 2 --network celo --reset

keywords: streakbank, defi, DeFi, lend, lending, loan, loans, aave, compound, curve, dYdX, fulcrum
author: Streakbank
